hibernate-mapping.query: select count(scheque.ChequeBookNo) from PFMORM00011 as scheque where (scheque.ChequeBookNo = :chequeBookNo or :startNo between scheque.StartNo and scheque.EndNo or :endNo between scheque.StartNo and scheque.EndNo) and scheque.SourceBranchCode = :branchCode and scheque.AccountNo = :accountNo and scheque.Active = true

select count(scheque.ChequeBookNo) from PFMORM00011 as scheque where scheque.ChequeBookNo = :chequeBookNo and (:startNo between scheque.StartNo and scheque.EndNo or :endNo between scheque.StartNo and scheque.EndNo) and scheque.SourceBranchCode = :branchCode and scheque.Active = true

select count(scheque.ChequeBookNo) from PFMORM00011 as scheque where :chequeNo between scheque.StartNo and scheque.EndNo and scheque.SourceBranchCode = :branchCode and scheque.AccountNo= :accountNo and scheque.Active = true

select count(scheque.ChequeBookNo) from PFMORM00011 as scheque where scheque.AccountNo = :accountNo and scheque.ChequeBookNo = :chequeBookNo and :startNo between scheque.StartNo and scheque.EndNo or :endNo between scheque.StartNo and scheque.EndNo and scheque.SourceBranchCode = :branchCode and scheque.Active = true
select new schequedto (s.AccountNo, s.ChequeBookNo, s.SourceBranchCode, s.StartNo, s.EndNo ) from PFMORM00011 as s where s.Active = true and s.AccountNo = :accountNo

select new schequedto (s.AccountNo, s.ChequeBookNo, s.SourceBranchCode, s.StartNo, s.EndNo, s.Active ) from PFMORM00011 as s where s.AccountNo = :accountNo and s.ChequeBookNo = :chequebookNo and s.SourceBranchCode= :sourcebr

update PFMORM00011 s set s.Active = false, s.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, s.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where s.AccountNo = :accountNo and s.ChequeBookNo=:checkBookNo and s.StartNo=:startSerialNo and s.EndNo=:endSerialNo and s.Active = true

select new schequedto (s.AccountNo, s.ChequeBookNo, s.StartNo, s.EndNo, s.Remark, s.DATE_TIME ) from PFMORM00011 as s where s.Active = true and s.AccountNo = :accountNo and s.SourceBranchCode=:branch order by s.DATE_TIME

select new schequedto (s.AccountNo, s.ChequeBookNo, s.StartNo, s.EndNo, s.Remark, s.DATE_TIME ) from PFMORM00011 as s where s.Active = true and convert(char(10),s.DATE_TIME,111) between convert(char(10),:startDate,111) and convert(char(10),:endDate,111) and s.SourceBranchCode=:branch order by s.DATE_TIME
